name: gestureRecognizer(_:shouldBeRequiredToFailBy:)
desc: Asks the delegate if the current gesture recognizer must fail before another gesture recognizer is allowed to recognize its gesture.
declaration:
optional func gestureRecognizer(_ gestureRecognizer: NSGestureRecognizer, 
       shouldBeRequiredToFailBy otherGestureRecognizer: NSGestureRecognizer) -> Bool
